name: CIFLookup
author: Jesse Bowling
description: Lookup a hash, IP, or domain against a CIF server

configurationItems.name: limit
configurationItems.description: Define the maximum number of results per request

configurationItems.name: remote
configurationItems.description: Define the remote CIF url (including https://, etc.)

configurationItems.name: verify
configurationItems.description: Verify TLS certificate when connecting to CIF
